This is the 90's kids game known as "Rock,Paper,Scissors". 

 The rules are simple select any one of the shapes. 
 Rock wins scissors, losses to paper 
 Paper wins rock, losses to scissors 
 Scissors wins paper, losses to rock 

 WIN ANY TWO OF THE THREE ROUNDS 
 If not don't worry try again. 

 KINDLY ORIENT IN ONE DIRECTION TO PREVENT SCORE LOSS
